_comment: Created by ianb on 27/06/2014 16:24:02 using v2.1
title: How has the rate of VTE risk assessment changed?
analysis_commentary: There has been an increase in the proportion of admissions assessed for VTE risk across all types of provider of NHS-funded acute care from 2010/11 Q1. They have differing start points but converged to a common level of performance. In 2013/14 Q4 , the proportion of admissions receiving a VTE assessment was 96.0% in acute providers and 98.5% in independent sector providers.
data_source: NHS England, Venous Thromboembolism Risk Assessment data collection
